comment: Lectures were long, but what you would expect in an intro class. Participation helped and she would work with you if needed. Tests weren't too hard if you read the material.

Dr. Garai's class was quite dull She is very nice, don't get me wrong. But her lectures just drag on forever and aren't very helpful for the test material. I feel like I leaned everything I was supposed to learn for PSYC 1101, but it was at my own initiative. PS- she takes forever to respond to emails. She's pretty easy on the eyes, though.
